meanings.sent1: The rainiest month in our city is usually April.
meanings.sent2: Today is the rainiest day of the week.
meanings.sent3: I always forget my umbrella on the rainiest days!
meanings.sent4: Her garden turned into the rainiest place on earth after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The rainiest season brings lush greenery and vibrant flowers.

meanings.sent1: This is the rainiest year we've had in a long time.
meanings.sent2: The rainiest clouds are the ones that bring thunderstorms.
meanings.sent3: He wore his rainiest boots to jump in puddles and have fun.
meanings.sent4: The rainiest sky seemed to weep endlessly over the land.
meanings.sent5: The rainiest weather always makes me want to stay indoors and read a book.
